title: ambaa mahaavaaNi
sahitya:
ambA mahAvANi akhila vidyAdAyini





anupallavi



 ambuja bhavAnandE Ana tAmara brndE kambugaLE karuNisau kamala padE shAradE



caraNam

 bhAsurAngI bhakta pAlini bhArati bhUsurArcitapadE bhukti muktipradE

 vAsisenna mukhadali shrI sarasvatIshvari vAsavArcitE harikEshapurAdhIsvari
